column1:
4.3.2.1	
Summary of evidence and recommendations for the diagnosis of mixed urinary incontinence

Complete a thorough history and examination as part of the assessment of mixed urinary 
incontinence (MUI).
Characterise MUI as either stress-predominant or urgency-predominant where possible.

Use bladder diaries and urodynamics as part of the multimodal assessment of MUI to help 
inform the most appropriate management strategy.
